original_title: Romeo Contra La Muzzarella Lisergica Asesina
overview: What Romeo wants is to chill out in front of the TV with some pizza. Soon he will realize that this isn't going to happen. He will see that the pizza box doesn't contain an ordinary mozzarella pizza, but a murderous mozzarella pizza.
title: Romeo Contra La Muzzarella Lisergica Asesina
